meeting_request.purpose: Feeling overwhelmed by first-year classes and my major
meeting_request.description: Hi, my name is Nicholas and I'm a first-year student in English. I’m really enjoying my first-year English professor and some of the themes and topics we’re covering, but I also feel really nervous about the workload and whether I can keep up. I’ve also majored in history, and I’m not sure if that will help me in this major, especially since I’m not really interested in history anymore. I’m still new to college, and I’m worried I’m not doing well enough to fit in already.
